item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:46 Chances: Increased operating revenues and managerial financial margin are partially offset by escalating costs for Itau Unibanco (ITUB) in fourth-quarter 2023. Ita√∫ Unibanco Holding S.A. (NYSE:ITUB) recently announced a dividend of $0.23 per share, payable on 2024-03-15, with the ex-dividend date set for 2024-02-22.
